title: Pie Maker Quick Meat Pie
directions: Heat oil in a saucepan, add minced beef and onion,
cook over moderate heat for 4 minutes, add sauce,
gravy mix, water, herbs and season with salt and
Blend cornflour with water, add to meat mixture and
stir until mixture boils and thickens. Allow to cool and
Preheat Pie Maker until the ‘Ready-to-bake’ light
Insert pastry bases, fill each base with ½ cup meat
mixture and cover with pastry tops.
Close lid and cook pies. Check after 3-5 minutes and
remove when pies are golden brown.
ingredients: 1 sheet ready-rolled shortcrust pastry, for bases
1 sheet ready-rolled puff pastry, for top
